safetyTips: There is no access to pub itself. Food orders are given a collection time that we ask people to adhere to. There is ample outside space to queue. Please do not use the seating area in front of the pub.
name: THE DOG HOUSE
address: The Dog House, Evegate, Station Road, Smeeth, Ashford, TN25 6SX
deliveryHours: Monday 17:00 - 19:00 Collection Only (Food only Fri & Sat eve)
Tuesday 17:00 - 19:00 Collection Only (Food only Fri & Sat eve)
Wednesday 17:00 - 19:00 Collection Only (Food only Fri & Sat eve)
Thursday 17:00 - 19:00 Collection Only (Food only Fri & Sat eve)
Sunday 12:00 - 14:00 Collection Only (Food only Fri & Sat eve)
description: Open for takeaway local ale and ciders all week. Friday evening for takeaway homemade pizza and Saturday evening for burgers. Follow our Facebook page for updates and ordering.
